content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
Hi our server got attached by LockBit 4.0

735C3C1C815E3EFBA5E4B628C5E8200F
This is the personal identifier provided
Okay
this price is 8,000 USDT
if u pay it completed  whithin 72 hours,u can get discount
only 6,000 USDT
We will never cheat our customers. Promise will definitely do it.
Are you able to help locate the system vulnerability, so they can protect themselves from further attacks
If you want to buy intrusion paths and protection suggestions. A USDT of 10,000 must be paid.
We will provide textual intrusion paths and defense advice for you.
just a moment. boss will decrypt test within 24 hours
So I have to wait for 24 hours?
Sure,within 24h

ID: 735C3C1C815E3EFB489A941DA802E967
Here is the ID for this file, also help me ask if they can provide the secret key for this ID only, so we can test it on our side as well
u need use personal id access
Can you explain what you mean? I'm just passing on message
You don't need to tell me the decrypt id. We already know when you visit.
these two id from same company
ok, sounds good

They validated the file and said it is correct.
What's the best price you can do for decryption?
If you want to buy intrusion paths and protection suggestions. A USDT of 10,000 must be paid.
all data and intrusion paths
if u pay it completed whithin 72 hours,u can get discount. only 6,000 USDT,just decrypt program
Can you give a better price just for the decrypt program
No
Our team celebrates the achievement of new milestones. Offering customers, your lowest decryption price is 4,000 USDT.

Thank you for your update. Unfortunately, the offered price is still way beyond our budget. We are currently facing severe financial difficulties, potentially approaching bankruptcy.

Though I got so much pressure from my boss to get the files back, but we simply do not have the funds to meet the current decryption price. While our team is working on transcribing printed backups into digital format, the encrypted files remain extremely valuable to us.

I would truly appreciate any further flexibility you can offer on the pricing.
Have you given up?
What do you mean?
If you choose to give up paying the ransom, we will follow up.
We will conduct subsequent attacks, incidents and data disclosure.

I really need to get the files back, but your request is far beyond what the company are able to pay. As I told you, the company is on the edge of bankruptcy, and I have not been paid in over two months. I only make $300 a month, and if I could, I would spend my own money to help get a resolution. I am therefore asking for your understanding. Can you speak to your boss and possibly offer something more reasonable given our situation?
i don't care. u are lier
if u cant pay ransom. after 24 hours,price is recovery. the lowest price is 6,000 USDT
what's the result?

Mutual trust is important in this incident, the way you responded makes it difficult for us to trust you. Making us concern that even if we pay, future attacks might still happen.
Regarding you demand, the requested price is far beyond our budget due to stated reasons. It appears you have a lot of power in deciding the price for ransom, so I hope we can come to a fair deal in these up coming days.
By the way, you sounds educated, I assume this is just a side hustle for you. I'm curious what do you do other than this job and how did you get into this business.

We are a member of the world's largest ransomware alliance. You must doubt our integrity. After receiving the ransom, your data will be restored. We will not attack again. If you do not pay the ransom, we will launch a follow-up attack.

We follow the rules strictly, you can read our affiliate program.
After reaching an agreement, we will give you everything.
We are very busy. If no transaction agreement is reached in the next few days, I will check and reply to your message once every 24 hours.

Through our conversation, you should be a professional agent, perhaps a person in a cybersecurity profession. A professional businessman.
First, we are honest.
Second, our five tests need to be well paid.
Third, our alliance has a strict plan, and credibility is important to us.
Third, as a professional negotiator, you should know that lying cannot reduce the ransom price for you. This strategy is very poor.
Fourth, we have the data of this target, and we know that these ransoms are not expensive for Chinese companies.

I'm not trying to deceive you but just passing on what they wanted me to say. I can tell you they still want the files back. I want this deal to happen just as you are. Since I'm earning commission fees from them, and you probably get some reward from closing a deal too.

All this is normal, a normal transaction.
We are honest and we can ensure decryption after receiving the ransom.
If the ransom is too low, we will not decrypt it.
We cannot break the price rules. Otherwise no one will give a reasonable ransom price. Our five tests require excellent rewards.
Decryptor will delete at - 2025-05-03 14:41:10
What are you referring to with the term "five tests"?
I talked to them again, they offered 1000 USDT.
your lowest decryption price is 4,000 USDT.
If it is below this price, please do not contact me.
They offered 1,500 USDT, and was asking for concession from your side

2500 USDT. This is the lowest price. If you don’t agree, you will lose it forever.
The decryption will be deleted soon. You must complete the payment as soon as possible.
It takes time to contact the boss, you must contact us before 2025-05-01 00:00:00.
